Description: Available September 1 - This stunning 1 bedroom provides a rare opportunity to live in a beautifully renovated space on one of the best streets in Jamaica Plain. The apartment features a large private porch off the sun showered living room, spacious bedroom with huge walk in closet that houses the in unit full size washer/dryer, separate dinning room, large galley kitchen with pantry, quartz counter tops, and gas range. The bathroom is absolutely gorgeous featuring a large stand up steam shower w/full glass enclosure, and plenty of built in storage. There is a private storage locker in the basement, a shared backyard/patio area perfect for entertaining friends, and best of all your own private off street parking spot. Also less than 5 minutes away are Jamaica Pond, the Emerald Necklace bike trail, Wholefoods, CVS, and several great bars and restaurants. Don't hesitate to call to schedule a tour of this beautiful home. FIRST, SECURITY, BROKER FEE DUE W/LEASE THROUGH 8/31. SORRY NO PETS.
